main event: Harvey J. Crimi observed a stationary white, round light in New York, N.Y. during the evening.
interesting points: The object was stationary for one hour,There were two witnesses present: Harvey J. Crimi and M.J. Lewis,The object emitted red and blue flashes,The sighting was reported to local authorities,The observer believed it could be a satellite, searchlight, or unidentified.
witness description: Harvey J. Crimi, Junior Designer, 34 years old, male, and M.J. Lewis
